name: Human A.I.
description:
What is it ?

Human A.I. is a game where you control a robot by tinkering with it's internal. It's a level based game so the objective depends on the level.

Current State of the game

Only one prototype has been made for the game currently (which you can download).  The prototype only has one level. In it, your objective is to destroy a target... really simple.

The purpose of this prototype is to test out if the idea can be further developed so please give your opinion/critic after playing it.

Plans

If the prototype is successful our the plan is to develop this game for mobile (IOS/Android).
